text: À bit far away from Napier MRT with no sheltered pavement. Nevertheless, it seems like a nice church.
A large and beautiful church. The pastor is also a wonderful person. We also provide simultaneous English translation!
Regarding eternal life, why did Jesus have to die on the cross? If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. Due to the coronavirus, advance reservations are required.

We worship in Japanese.
English translation is also available.
Japanese service and English interpretation are available.
